content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="f of x, equals, sine x, plus cosine x " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the absolute minimum value of <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext=" open bracket, 0 comma 2 pi, close bracket " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>[</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>]</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the square root of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the negative of the square root of 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math>
